description: This joke hinges on the wordplay between 'king' as a title and 'King Salmon' as a fish species.
title: Royal Waters
n_1: By the river, Fisher Fred spots a salmon with a tiny crown.
c1_1: Greetings, human! I am the King of the River!
c2_1: A talking salmon? And a king?
n_2: King Salmon swims majestically in the water.
c1_2: Yes, I rule these waters wisely.
c2_2: Do all your subjects wear crowns?
n_3: Fred looks amazed as King Salmon performs a regal flip.
n_4: They share a laugh as King Salmon continues to swim.
c1_4: Spread the word of my kingdom!
